attributes.action: Replace the benefit system with a pay as you work system designed around a persons capabilities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that instead of automatically paying an individual based on their circumstances in return for nothing. People should be paid benefits for carrying out jobs given to them by the government, like a wage.
 
A role should, and can be found for almost any circumstance and thus it is unnecessary to just let people make excuses to be lazy. 

This would benefit the country as a whole, as jobs can be created that improve communities and teach people which will improve their chances of finding work in the future.
